Text:
I have read all the comments,if you don't see your request in this flood it's because I don't have the book(s) you requested on hand,sorry

I will include them in future floods if/when I get them.

Thanx for all the great comments,I appreciate them :)

Happy Reading :P
BBS
I will upload another flood tomorrow with a few requests I forgot to include :)
You are THE best BBS !!   Thanks so much for the Megan Abbott books and if you can upload any others of hers I would be ever so grateful :)  Cheers !!

Great work!  Many thanks.

Any chance someone can do a NY Times Bestseller List update?  Last one was back in June.  Damn, I miss Demonoid.
If you could get "Down to You" by M. Leighton or any books by the author.  Thanks so much!!!

Also, I'm not sure if anyone else is interested but I would love to see some cookbooks like "Baked: New Frontiers in Baking", "Baked Explorations: Classic American Desserts Reinvented", and "Baked Elements: Our 10 Favorite Ingredients" all by Matt Lewis.
Thank you.
@ gianelli ...  search "bestsellers" and you will find a current list.
Thank you so much BBS, you are the very BEST ! So many other great reads too...my new BFF !
Thank you so much BBS for the books, there are some great reads here! You are the very BEST ...my new BFF ! Muchly appreciated!

I appreciate all these book floods. Its gotten my book list to over 90,000 now yay. If I could please recommend a few books. In order from most important to not. Im not sure if any of these are in your book flood im still checking but if not.

1. Scars From a Memours (Marnie Mann)
2. The Near Witch (Victoria Schwab)
3. Blood Wounds (Susan Beth Pfefer)
4. Fury - Elizabeth Miles
5. Ruined (Paula Morris)
6. Passing Strange (Daniel Waters)
7. Lost Girl a Memoir of Promiscuity (Carie Cohen).

Thanks, keep up the excellent work please :)
Your book floods help make my horrible day job bearable, thank you so much...! I check for them obsessively :)
You never fail to please. Thanks for the Beverly Lewis. Wife can never get enough of the Christian romance novels Ty so much for all the time you put in providing all of these uploads
BBS Rocks! Thanks you so much. Any chance you could upload "India Becoming" by Akash Kapur? Please and thank you!

Thanks!
THANK YOU!!!! All your efforts are greatly appreciated!
THANKS BBS, what would we do without you?
Thanks BBS.....awesome!!!! You rock!!!!

Thanks once again for your incredible torrents, as always appreciated. Your Flood 22 included Jane Feather books, just so that you know most of these are faulty and can not be opened. I have been trying to get her books for ages and have found this problem before.

Silvergal, latest NY Times Bestseller torrent available anywhere is JUNE 2012.  Usually someone makes the new list or additions available every 6 weeks or so.

Anyone who can provide a current update will be hero to me.

bigbluesea, thanks again.

Andrew Vachss!!!! You are the most reliable book source around.Man you could not have done a better job!! REALLY appreciate this.If I could make another request:anything non-fiction on The Beatles.Cheers BBS

Thank you so much!
THANK YOU SO MUCH! You're the best :)

Thank you yet again BBS! Perfect timing with the weekend coming up too - I can get some good reading done, but a flood this big I will require a long weekend.  Guess I'll have to call in sick Monday!  Thanks again.

Thanks for the Georgette Heyer books.
Do you have any books by Meg Cabot and Kami Garcia?

@tooniedog 

I checked the file in question as well as the ones in flood 22 and they all open on my side.There was another member who had the same problem with another epub file but it was his reader that wouldn't open that particular file.

If your using a desktop or Laptop download an epub reader and see if it opens the file,if it does then you know that it's your reader that won't open that certain file.Since "Jane Feather' has been requested a few times and this is the first time I had anyone say they couldn't open the file ,I'm thinking it just might be your reader that is refusing to to open it

Thanx for the comment :)

As usual, you're just the best! And I feel kindda guilty asking for more :$

Thanks for everything! :)
